title: Remove cancelled flight from home/lock screen w/out disabling flight notifications all together.
content: I am trying to remove cancelled flights from my home / lock screen notifications with out turning off all flight notifications from the home screen settings  It gets really confusing when I have multiple flights and it's displaying the wrong information. I've deleted it from my calendar and from My trips, as well as the itenerary from my e-mail. I've also Reboot and completely power cycled my phone to no avail. I'm out of things to try.
